---
title: "Colophon"
---

This website is my personal corner of the internet where I share thoughts on digital health, medical informatics, and AI in healthcare.

## Design

The design aims for clarity and readability. The color palette is inspired by warm, professional tones with deep navy, soft sage, and warm taupe creating a comfortable reading experience in both light and dark modes.

## Colors

- **Primary colors:** Deep Navy/Charcoal (#2C3E50), Soft Sage/Muted Teal (#7A9B9E), Warm Taupe (#C4A57B)
- **Supporting colors:** Cream/Warm Off-White (#F5F1E8), Warm Grey-Brown (#8B7B6B)
- **Usage:** Navy for structure and headers, Sage for links and accents, Taupe for decorative elements and hover states

## Typography

- **Body text:** [Literata](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Literata) by TypeTogether
- **Headings and navbar:** [Work Sans](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Work+Sans) by Wei Huang
- **Footer and code:** [Geist Mono](https://vercel.com/font) by Vercel

## Technology

Built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), an open-source scientific and technical publishing system. The source code is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/tiagojct/tiagojct.eu).

## Hosting

Deployed and hosted on [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/).
